mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant_place_fee_month_summary_record (month_date , place_num , month_place_fee ,tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{item.monthDate}, #{item.placeNum}, #{item.monthPlaceFee}, #{item.tenantId}), #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})
